topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555bc5646368726905360000#post_555bc5646368726905360000
[bq="EHAN"]Here's how I see it.

NSFW _images_ should go in the fetish thread unless explicitly spoilered and labeled NSFW, as images usually seem to pertain to fetishes

NSFW _discussion_ can stay here, as most of the time it's just everyone lightheartedly talking dirty to each other and it never seems to get as much of a reaction as images do (but if you are gonna post something more hardcore, spoiler it and label it NSFW as we do with images)

The new thread isn't necessary, honestly. Just stay here so we don't have to pick sides, there's no reason why we can't coexist anymore, nothing much has changed.[/bq]
I like this proposal.

*MAKE THIS A THING AND END THE BULL RIGHT NOW*

topics.body:
Like I said before:

Fetish thread: plain and simple, for the hardcore NSFW, as it was, where you guys post the images and stuff. Keep that there.

There's really no need for the SFW/NSFW split, as that would just cause extremes for the NSFW side. Leave it at one thread, and leave the "possible NSFW" notification so that leaves it open for the more softcore stuff (which we have basically done for as long as I can remember anyways, so it's nothing different) as opposed to the hardcore stuff that should just belong in the fetish thread anyways.

Agree or disagree? I want a legitimate civilized discussion, as much as you guys claim that you can't stand it, I think it'd be for the best for the future of the thread.

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555bc84f63687248be473200#post_555bc84f63687248be473200
That reminds me, I have like 4 episodes to catch up on. :/
